original_text: provided you are careful to keep all this commandment, which I command you today, by loving the Lord your God and by walking ever in his ways—then you shall add three other cities to these three,
korean_text: 또 너희가 오늘 내가 너희에게 명하는 이 모든 명령을 지켜 행하여 네 하나님 여호와를 사랑하고 항상 그의 길로 행할 때에는 이 셋 외에 세 성읍을 더하여

sentences.original_text: provided you are careful to keep all this commandment
by loving the Lord your God
and by walking ever in his ways
then you shall add three other cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하면 너는 다른 세 도시를 더하게 될 것이라
